content.question: Major Protestant and Roman Catholic leaders of the sixteenth century condemned the Anabaptists because Anabaptists

choices.label: rejected the Bible as the source of religious truth
advocated a complete separation of church and state
restored the privileges of the clergy
tried to reconcile Protestant and Catholic teachings

content.answer: advocated a complete separation of church and state
